reviewText:
"Dick Stolley is a national treasure, and his ability to calmly, clearly tell the story of one of America's saddest days is truly remarkable.
This documentary is devoid of the usual bells and whistles. It's just unbelievably powerful, old-school storytelling. And what a story it is."
John Huey, Editor-in-Chief, Time Inc. (at time of film's release)
